Optional Cookes for POST requestsdata = {'key': 'value'} # Optional data for POST requestsparsed_html = html_txt(url, Headers=headers, Data=data,Cookie=cookie) # data for POST requests parsed_html = html_txt(url, Headers=headers,Cookie=cookie) # for Get requests print(parsed_html)
